properties.areaDesc: Lafayette, MS; Tallahatchie, MS; Panola, MS; Hardeman, TN; Yalobusha, MS; Benton, MS; Marshall, MS; Henderson, TN; Chester, TN; Fayette, TN; Madison, TN
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 11 at 7:43AM CST until January 11 at 9:45AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a

* Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for...
Western Lafayette County in northwestern Mississippi...
Western Yalobusha County in northwestern Mississippi...
Central Marshall County in northwestern Mississippi...
Northeastern Tallahatchie County in northwestern Mississippi...
Northwestern Benton County in northeastern Mississippi...
Southeastern Panola County in northwestern Mississippi...
Northwestern Henderson County in western Tennessee...
Southeastern Fayette County in western Tennessee...
Hardeman County in western Tennessee...
Madison County in western Tennessee...
West central Chester County in western Tennessee...

* Until 945 AM CST.

* At 743 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to
thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding in
the advisory area. Up to one inch of rain has already fallen.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Jackson, Oxford, Humboldt, Holly Springs, Bolivar, Water Valley,
Charleston, Wall Doxey State Park, Chickasaw State Park, George
Payne State Park, Holly Springs National Forest, Chickasaw State
Forest, Lamar, Fairview, Whiteville, Three Way, Snow Lake Shores,
Silerton, Paynes and Bethlehem.
properties.instruction:
A Flood Advisory means river or stream flows are elevated, or ponding
of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
